amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Millennium Challenge Account and the global HIV/AIDs initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to make foreign aid more effective and accountable by increasing funds for the Global Aids Initiative, $90 million, and the Millenium Challenge Corporation, $250 million, by decreasing the appropriation provided by the World Bank by $425 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 288 (Roll no. 382).
